name: Amla
description: Amla is a deciduous tree known for its vitamin C-rich fruit widely used in Ayurvedic medicine.

name: Curry Plant
description: An aromatic shrub often confused with curry leaf but mainly used for fragrance, not cooking.

name: Betel Leaf
description: A climber plant whose leaves are traditionally chewed in many Asian cultures.

name: Bamboo
description: Fast-growing woody grasses widely used for construction, food, and crafts.

name: Spinach
description: A leafy green vegetable rich in iron and vitamins.

name: Coriander
description: An herb used for its leaves and seeds in cooking worldwide.

name: Ashoka
description: A sacred tree in India known for its ornamental flowers and medicinal properties.

name: Custard Apple
description: A small tree producing sweet, pulpy fruits.

name: Lemongrass
description: An aromatic grass used in cooking and traditional medicine.

name: Papaya
description: A fast-growing fruit tree known for its digestive benefits.

name: Curry Leaf
description: A small tree whose leaves are essential in South Indian cooking.

name: Lemon

description: A medicinal shrub used in traditional remedies.
